actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title VIII of the act entitled "An act to prescribe penalties for certain act of violence or intimidation, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides that the prohibitions against discrimination in the sale or rental of housing shall apply to all dwellings after December 31, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VIII of the act entitled "An act to prescribe penalties for certain act of violence or intimidation, and for other purposes.
